Question: Dassault Systemes Americas Corp. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dassault Systemes Americas Corp.

Virtual Twin of the Human Body

 - Showcase of human virtual twin innovations
 - Integration of artificial intelligence for precision healthcare
 - Advancements in medical research and clinical trial efficiency
 - Representation of life through virtual twin experiences
